        Set whether the queue has been emptied and notifies all the threads to wake up.

      • isSignal

        Check whether the phone has signal.
        Returns:
        Whether the phone has signal or not.

      • setSignal

        public void setSignal(boolean signal)
        Set whether the phone has signal. This should really only be used by the signalListener.
        Parameters:
        signal - Whether the phone has signal or not.

      • setRunner

        public void setRunner(boolean runner)
        The semaphore for keeping the thread running. This can be left as true until the activity is no longer in use (onDestroy) where it can be set to false.
        Parameters:
        runner - Whether the thread should be kept running
